wikitext.*:
'''STAK''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "split, insert".<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 388 (root appearing as "STAK-")</ref>

==Derivatives<ref name=Ety/>==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''stankā'', ''staknā''
**[[Quenya]]: ''sanka'' ("cleft, split")
**[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''sthanka''
***[[Noldorin]]: ''[[thanc]]''

*[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''nestak-'' ("insert, stick in")
**[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''[[nestegi]]''

{{references}}
